name: MTLViewport
desc: A 3D rectangular region for the viewport clipping.

items.name: init(originX: Double, originY: Double, width: Double, height: Double, znear: Double, zfar: Double)
items.desc: Returns a new viewport of a specified size at a specified origin.

items.name: var originX: Double
items.desc: The x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the viewport.

items.name: var originY: Double
items.desc: The y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the viewport.

items.name: var width: Double
items.desc: The width of the viewport, in pixels.

items.name: var height: Double
items.desc: The height of the viewport, in pixels.

items.name: var znear: Double
items.desc: The z coordinate of the near clipping plane of the viewport.

items.name: var zfar: Double
items.desc: The z coordinate of the far clipping plane of the viewport.
